name: Bard Protocol
description: What is Bard Protocol (BARD)? Launched in 19/03/2023 by a team based in United Kingdom, Bard Protocol is a cryptocurrency token built on Ethereum Network that provides automated services for robots and AI devices. With its own AI bot developed, Bard Protocol streamlines tasks and provides insights into customer behaviors, trends, and medical diagnoses. BARD Protocol has revolutionized how people interact with machines and robots, making our lives easier and safer. BARD token has 4% tax fee on every transaction and it is the native token of BARD ecosystem.
